page.title: 13GIANT'S HALL FARM
page.content:
The farm is to the North West of Wigan on the edge of the{Beech Hill {Estate.}Four generations of the Gill family have farmed there in the last century. The owners showed us around and we saw the stone house dated{1675.}We saw the oak beams, an old heavy hay spade and some stone cheese presses. Nowadays some fields are let out to grow hay and barley but the owners no longer farm the land themselves. The farm was here long before the Beech Hill council housing estate. Two massive stones were the reason for the name 'Giant's Hall' being given to it.
